Was originally called ShiftPassword.

*Create a password:*
{{{
// create mutable password 
Password password = CaesarCipherPassword.createPassword("abid", 1);
// or
MutablePassword password = CaesarCipherPassword.createPassword("abid", 1);
// or
CaesarCipherPassword password = CaesarCipherPassword.createPassword("abid", 1);

// save password in database
String storePass = password.getPassword();
}}}

*Confirm password:*
{{{
// get password from database
String dbPassword = ...;

// automatically work out the type of mutable password
Password password = PasswordFactory.getInstance(dbPassword);
// or manually create password
CaesarCipherPassword password = new CaesarCipherPassword(dbPassword);

// confirm password is correct
boolean result = password.confirmPassword("confirmPassword");
}}}

*Usage:*
{{{
// This will shift the password by the hour. So, if the time is 4:25, it will shift the password 'abid' by four characters and the end result will be 'demh'.
Password password = CaesarCipherPassword.createPassword("abid", TimeType.HOUR);
}}}
